overview:
Collin Croome is a German multimedia entrepreneur and social media expert, who started his career in 1991.

At 16 he started to work with the first Macintosh II doing DTP and music in his spare time. At 19 he self-employed himself and started to work for Apple Germany and Medialab, one of Germanyâ€™s first multimedia-agencies.

From that point on he worked for several well-known international brands, corporation, adverting agencies, publishing houses and TV-stations.

From 1991-2001 Collin was a freelance marketing consultant, multimedia trainer and presenter for Apple.

In 1997 Collin Croome founded the multimedia agency coma2 e-branding where he stills is the managing director and key account manager for all clients.

Since 2008 Collin is doing social media and Facebook marketing trainings and workshops.

His agency coma2 e-branding is a creative agency for digital brand management and specialized in the premium fashion, luxury and lifestyle industry. The agency develops online marketing campaigns, image websites and iPhone Apps which are highly successful due to their creative ideas, high-quality design, intuitive user navigation and pioneering technical solutions.
